mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located in Sacramento, the Neoclassical structure was completed between 1861 and 1874 at the west end of Capitol Park, which is framed by L Street to the north, N Street to the south, 10th Street to the west, and 15th Street to the east. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/California_State_Capitol [work]
